details.description: The enlarged lamp head also provides good concentrated light for reading and good general light for small areas.
details.good_to_know: The light can be easily adjusted where you need it thanks to the adjustable lamp head. For example, you can aim it at a book for reading, use it as overhead lighting, or adjust it to focus on a specific area of the room..
details.energy_consumption: Maximum power consumption 100 W Maximum 53 watts.
